snippet: Sales figures for some trucks remained strong, but G.M., Ford, Toyota and Volkswagen all said severe winter weather had taken a toll on American sales of new cars.
abstract: Autodata Corp says severe cold weather across much of the country stalled new-vehicle sales were in February 2014; automakers sold 1.2 million vehicles, same as February 2013, for annualized rate of 15.34 million and below the 16 million the industry expects to sell in 2014.
lead_paragraph: Sales figures for some trucks remained strong, but G.M., Ford, Toyota and Volkswagen all said severe winter weather had taken a toll on American sales of new cars.

headline.main: Carmakers Say Sales Were Sluggish in Chilly February
headline.print_headline: Carmakers Say Sales Were Sluggish in Chilly February
